name: Nightmare (itch) (pello)
description:
All right, people, what are you waiting for? Another puzzle-platformer?
Another glorious day in the corps! A day in the Marine Corps is like a day on the farm. Every meal’s a banquet! Every paycheck a fortune! Every formation a parade! I love the corps! A security breach was detected. Fight your way through the stages where you have to finish with an invasion. 

Nightmare is a roguelike card game where every playthrough is completely different!

To clear the stage you have to:

  • Pick/attack all the tile
  • Find a way out.

To get ammo you need to:

  • Pick tiles (1 tile === 1 ammo unit)
  • Pick ammo cards
  • Kill enemies with weapons
